attributes.action: Restore the road network to central government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To remove traffic management from local authorities.To stop the removal of traffic lanes to general vehical use.To regulate traffic lights to ease traffic flow instead of stopping it.Administering congestion charges by central government only and only have these charges with the approval of local residents and businesses.Remove bus lanes and other hinderances to free flowing traffic imposed by local councils who make our lives miserable.
Give us a Transport Minister we can sack for all road problems that are artificially manufactured
